attributes.action: give up any pension that he is entitled to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's been said that the Government will not allow Sir Fred Goodwin to have the pension of £693,000 per year that he's entitled to.

The reason is that he has failed in his job and brought about the collapse of RBS.

The similiarity between Sir Fred Goodwin/ RBS and the Prime Minister/ UK is stark, and if for bringing about the collapse of a company means that Sir Fred Goodwin will not be entitled to his pension, then surely neither is the Prime Minister for bringing about the collapse of the wider UK economy.
